customSize.question: Can plywood be custom sized?
customSize.answer: Yes, we provide custom size orders according to your project needs. Our standard sizes are 1220 x 2440 mm and 1250 x 2500 mm, but we can produce custom sizes with certain minimum order quantities (MOQ). Please contact our sales team for further discussion about your custom specifications.

minimumOrder.question: What is the minimum order?
minimumOrder.answer: Minimum order quantity (MOQ) varies depending on product type and specifications. For standard products, MOQ starts from 1 x 20-foot container (approximately 22-25m³). For custom or special orders, MOQ may be higher. We also serve retail orders in smaller quantities with different pricing.

shipping.question: Is delivery to other cities/provinces available?
shipping.answer: Yes, we serve deliveries throughout Indonesia and exports to various countries. We have an integrated logistics system that partners with trusted courier companies to ensure products arrive safely and on time. Shipping costs will be calculated based on destination and order volume.

payment.question: What payment methods are accepted?
payment.answer: We accept various payment methods for your transaction convenience: Bank Transfer (BCA, Mandiri, BNI), Letter of Credit (L/C) for export transactions, and Cash for direct purchases at location. For regular customers, we also provide payment term options with applicable terms and conditions.

standard.name: Standard Plywood
standard.shortDescription: Versatile plywood for various construction and furniture needs
standard.description: Our standard plywood is designed to meet general needs in construction and furniture making. Made from high-quality wood with precision production processes, this plywood offers optimal strength and durability for various applications.

marine.name: Marine Plywood
marine.shortDescription: Water-resistant plywood for maritime and outdoor applications
marine.description: Premium Marine grade plywood with superior water resistance. Made with WBP (Water Boil Proof) glue and select wood, this product is ideal for applications exposed to water and high humidity.

filmFaced.name: Film Faced Plywood
filmFaced.shortDescription: Plywood with film coating for formwork and shuttering
filmFaced.description: Film Faced Plywood with surface coated in high-quality phenolic resin film. Ideal for concrete formwork due to its smooth surface, water resistance, and reusability.

decorative.name: Decorative Plywood
decorative.shortDescription: Decorative plywood with natural finish for luxury interiors
decorative.description: Premium decorative plywood with select wood veneer for beautiful finishing results. Perfect for luxury interiors, high-end furniture, and applications that prioritize aesthetics.

commercial.name: Commercial Plywood
commercial.shortDescription: Economical commercial plywood for large-scale projects
commercial.description: Commercial plywood with standard quality and economical pricing. Ideal for large-scale projects requiring high volume with efficient budget.

engineered.name: Engineered Plywood
engineered.shortDescription: Engineered plywood for demanding structural applications
engineered.description: Engineered Plywood with high structural standards. Specially designed for applications requiring superior strength and dimensional stability.
